parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The filter rules for the component.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 50.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

parameters.name: TypeName
parameters.description:
The name of the component. Valid values:

*   ACS:InstanceInformation
*   ACS:Application
*   ACS:File
*   ACS:Network
*   ACS:WindowsRole
*   ACS:Service
*   ACS:WindowsRegistry
*   ACS:WindowsUpdate
